features: 1.4 "(34.5mm) Super AMOLED, 450 x 450 pixels (~321 ppi density), 16M Colors, CPU: Dual-Core 1.15GHz, 361mAh Battery, Android Wear OS, One UI Watch 3, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi
The Galaxy Watch4 Classic uses red LEDs and infrared rays to calculate your SpO2 levels or the amount of oxygen in your blood.
Glass front (Gorilla Glass DX+), MIL-STD-810G compliant, 50m water-resistant (IP68), Compatible with standard 20mm straps, ECG certified, Blood pressure monitor

body.description: Samsung Galaxy Watch4 Classic. Make a stylish statement with an iconic silhouette and stainless-steel casing, while your watch keeps you in tune with your health and pushes you to go further. Make the most of every run with advanced coaching and oxygen-level monitoring that help you exercise smarter while increasing endurance. Leave your phone behind while staying connected — call, text and stream music all from your wrist with LTE connectivity. Galaxy Watch4 Classic is health evolved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Samsung wins again Cutting-Edge Tech with the Galaxy Watch 4
reviews.reviewText: Purchasing the Galaxy Watch 4 has been nothing short of a fantastic decision. I was a little nervous at first it being used and all but As a savvy shopper, getting this pre-owned gem at half the cost was a steal, especially when it performs as if it's brand new. Not a scratch to be seen, it's a testament to the durability and quality of Samsung's craftsmanship.Navigating its features feels intuitive and seamless, from the comprehensive fitness tracking to the standout sleep monitoring that has given me insightful data to improve my sleep quality. The updates promised by Samsung until 2026 assure me that my watch will stay current with the latest tech advancements.The Galaxy Watch 4 isn't just a smartwatch; it's a personal assistant, health guru, and a stylish accessory all wrapped around my wrist. If you're considering a smartwatch that balances aesthetics, functionality, and future-readiness, this is the one to watch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 1st smart watch.
reviews.reviewText: I like that it monitors sleep, walking, heart rate, ect. Also it looks nice, it's the 1st watch I've owned in years. What I don't like is battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with watch and seller...
reviews.reviewText: I will admit that i was a bit skeptical due to the price of these refurbished watches from WBB LLC. I'm like... this has to be a scam. How can they sell these watches at such a low price. i believed that even if they do show up, they will look like roadkill. NOT THE CASE AT ALL. not a scratch, ding, or mark. It functions like a new watch. And the battery life for these watches aren't great... but i get the battery life that i should. WBB LLC has a fast and professional customer service. I will be buying from them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect condition..sharp looking and works perfect
reviews.reviewText: Great price for reworked Samsung Watch 5 and it is like new. Works perfect and very classy looking. 46mm size was a concern but it is light and I don't notice it even though I haven't worn a watch in years. Battery life is good and syncs fast and easy with my Sansung Flip 4 phone. Awesome and love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking watch and features
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised to see this price. Got the package in the mail. The watch looks great like and has nice mass like a nice Tissot you would buy. The watch came completely dead and I had to play around with the charger to get it to start charging. It staid at 0%. I tried a few different power blocks and it started charging. It came with possibly a bad power block. After it charged it powered right up. You use the Galaxy wearable app on your Android to sync the watch with bluetooth. It has all the apps that I use on apple watch a ton like Strava and Shazam. FYI it does not see to have a heart rate app that is native. I tried using the Samsung health app but it's not compatible unless you have Samsung phone. I found a few other apps and it works fine and the heart rate also works with Strava. Overall the watch looks great and has some cool faces. Apple watch is cool and smaller, but the Galaxy watch looks a lot better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery life is at most 20% of what you would normally get in a brand new watch.
reviews.reviewText: When I finally received the watch, I immediately placed it on the charging station. After reaching 100% charge, I removed it from the station and went to sleep. The next morning, I woke up to an alarm indicating a low battery, despite it being at full charge the night before. Surprisingly, the device drained completely in about 6 hours while sitting idle on the table all night. Additionally, there are a couple of scratches on the face, barely noticeable up close. I had expected something closer to a brand-new condition when I ordered a watch listed as 'EXCELLENT CONDITION'.What frustrated me further was discovering similar complaints in the comments section. Someone reported the exact battery issue I encountered about 14 days before my purchase. Moreover, I noticed a trend: more positive reviews from those who bought devices in good condition rather than those listed as excellent.Overall, this was a disappointing experience. I strongly advise considering spending a bit more for a brand-new item, as there's no assurance that if I return this watch, the next recipient won't face similar issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the watch I have been looking for!
reviews.reviewText: Over the past 5 years I had many smart watches and was never satisfied with any of them. This is the best so far! The first thing I like is it uses Wear OS instead of a proprietary software. I am able to use many more apps and add watch faces I like. I bought the watch for a "health" watch more than a "fitness" watch. I wanted the features of the blood oxygen, heart rate, ECG and such. I had other watches and the blood oxygen never was accurate but this one is. Of course, another advantage of the watch is it so popular there are so many accessories available at low cost. I have several bands and covers so I can change the entire look of the watch when I feel like it. The battery life is typical of smart watches. For me it is pretty much a day, but recharging is fast, and the charger is easy. I would suggest an extension cable and optional "cradle". Before this watch I bought the Moto watch 100 as it had great battery life but hated it. The software was terrible, and the blood oxygen test was useless. My main complaint is the software. It works really well but there is no way to generate any decent kind of report. I like to send my doctor and that is available is some cheesy PNG graphs. I am told I can link it to MyChart which many hospitals including mine, but you must get the doctor to approve it. I am waiting to see if this works. All in all, I am very happy. I like the look of the watch and for my larger wrist the 46mm looks good and gives me good view. The notifications work great and there are many ways to customize. This was a "refurbished" watch and as far as I am concerned it is new. There were no flaws and seems to function just great. I don't need fancy packaging and the cost savings was a blessing. I am a happy camper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good watch
reviews.reviewText: This watch, the Samsung Galaxy 4 classic, came in like new condition with a very good battery and watch band. I love it. Highly recommend this watch from this seller. The Wear OS is updated to version 4 and the security update is from July 2023. It has all the same software that the new galaxy 6 watches have.

Al principio estaba algo un poco preocupado porque veía algunas reseñas malas y otras pues no tanto, pero que como quiera eran de preocupación, pero creo que también tiene mucho que ver que la gente que le llega el producto bien y sin problemas no suele mandar una reseña, simplemente sigue con su producto sin más ni más, en fin, respecto a el reloj, tengo que decir que llego en EXCELENTES CONDICIONES y un poco antes de lo esperado.Si estas buscando un reloj con buenas prestaciones, económico y que se vea muy bonito y elegante, este es el reloj indicado.Y te recomiendo comprar la correa de acero (la cual no viene incluida) simplemente se ve espectacular 👌 vale mucho la pena.Apenas me llego y luego luego hice la reseña, creo que haré otra al mes o dos meses de uso y actualizare que tal me ah ido, de momento el paquete llego mucho mejor de lo que esperaba, muchas gracias Amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: very good for the price and it had a physical bezel

reviews.reviewText: A big upgrade from the Gear 3. 3 days battery life is good considering the features. The watch has the look and feel of quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Contra el Agua, poca duracion de bateria
reviews.reviewText: Al ser reempacado, sabia que vendria con posibles defectos.La bateria la tengo que cargar todos los dias, pero como carga 20 minutos aprox. No tengo inconveniente en cargarlo siempre que me siento a jugar un poco en la PC. (De todos modos me lo quitaria para jugar)Me animé a usarlo en un Sauna y sin problema usando la funcion antiagua.Las correas de poca calidad pero he comprado ya unas mejores.El monitoreo de eventos de caminar y de sueño excelente. A juego con mi celular Samsung

Al principio tenía mis dudas con respecto a comprar un producto reacondicionado, pero cuando llego era lo que esperaba, a simple vista parece nuevo pero trae un pequeño raspón en el vicel, la batería le dura 1 día y medio, tarda 2 horas en cargar, llevo dos días usándolo desde que me llego y no me arrepiento de comprar este producto
